sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Dashboard = ({ user, onLogout }) => { return (

🎯 P2P Exchange Dashboard

Welcome, {user.name}!

Hello, {user.name}! 👋

You have successfully logged into your P2P Exchange account.

Account Status

Email Verified: ✅ Verified
KYC Status: {user.kycStatus === 'verified' ? '✅ Verified' : '⏳ Pending'}
User ID: #{user.id}

Quick Actions

Next Steps to Start Trading

  1. {user.kycStatus === 'verified' ? '✅' : '1.'} Complete KYC Verification
  2. 2. Add Payment Methods
  3. 3. Browse or Create Trade Ads
  4. 4. Start Trading!
); }; export default Dashboard;
